item.title: Using the Google Calendar API
item.description: I use Google Calendar almost every day and really appreciate apps that can coordinate important events for me automatically. Today, we’ll learn how to integrate Google’s JavaScript API client with Firebase to make authenticated requests to the Calendar API on the behalf of a user. This article was inspired by the real-world requirements of a Broadway Life, a tour company in NYC and needs to perform full CRUD operations on their clients’ calendar.
